attributes.action: Stop the disgusting waste of resources and monies on the members of the G8 summit meeting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please express disgust on the absolute shameful expenditure and greed shown at the ongoing summit meeting in Japan.  How can we be lectured by our Prime Minister on conserving our input and saving of food whilst indulging in the spectacle of greed shown by the world leaders.  Please lead by example and perhaps we all would have more respect in the role of Government

rejection.details: The recent G8 summit was hosted by Japan.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
